title: Driver Going ‘Too Quick’ Before Fatal Bus Crash
description: Acting Northern Region Commander Tracy Chapman addresses the media near the scene of a bus crash in the NSW Hunter Valley, Australia. Monday, June 12, 2023. As many as 10 people have been killed and at least 10 others have been injured in a bus crash in the NSW Hunter Valley, police say. Emergency services were called to the crash site about 11.30pm on Sunday after reports a coach had rolled. (AAP Image/Darren Pateman)
